## Why Superseded
SME input: "The best goal is to find anomalies... there is no concept of leakage... it's spend RCA or CPA std deviation. The goal is to find ontology, not so much an idea of what the metrics are."

Fixed classifications don't capture the nuance needed. Anomaly detection with RCA provides better insights.
